entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'the boy' by Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A wizard and gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is trying to inform Harry about his true identity.

entities.name: vernon dursley
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is trying to prevent Hagrid from telling Harry the truth about his identity.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wizard and headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who left a letter for Harry.

relationships.description: Hagrid is angry with Uncle Vernon for keeping the truth about Harry's identity from him.
Hagrid was present when Dumbledore left a letter for Harry.
